# Unified domain name to IP address resolver

[![license](https://img.shields.io/badge/License-MIT-brightgreen.svg?style=for-the-badge)](https://opensource.org/licenses/MIT)
[![github](https://img.shields.io/badge/github-katyo/unicom--nres-8da0cb.svg?style=for-the-badge&logo=github)](https://github.com/katyo/unicom-nres)
[![crates](https://img.shields.io/crates/v/unicom-nres.svg?style=for-the-badge&color=fc8d62&logo=rust)](https://crates.io/crates/unicom-nres)
[![docs](https://img.shields.io/badge/docs.rs-unicom--nres-66c2a5?style=for-the-badge&logo=data:image/svg+xml;base64,)](https://docs.rs/unicom-nres)
[![status](https://img.shields.io/github/workflow/status/katyo/unicom/Rust?style=for-the-badge&logo=github-actions&logoColor=white)](https://github.com/katyo/unicom/actions?query=workflow%3ARust)

**IMPORTANT NOTE**: Async runtime feature should be selected explicitly.

## Supported features

* __tokio__ Use [tokio](https://docs.rs/tokio/)
* __async-std__ Use [async-std](https://docs.rs/async-std/)
* __c-ares__ Use [c-ares-resolver](https://docs.rs/c-ares-resolver/)
